Reviews.Content: Atmosphere reminiscent of 'Dirty pretty things' and '8mm'. Executive Extended Stay Suites and Hotel 300 10th Avenue, Seattle, WA 98122 Atmosphere reminiscent of Dirty pretty things and 8mm. Un-enthusiastic goth kid with pentagram and error tattoos for $85 dollar a night service? Barrior door between rooms unable to lock?! Handwritten signs in the garage and a notice that the hotel is not responsible for any damage that occurs to vehicles with the word damage clearly keyed across.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: Oh the Humanity I am not sure where I should begin. ***CONS****1) The place is filthy2) All of the furniture was purchased at a flea market and had not been cleaned since. 3) The walls are crumbling and lacking the tender loving care of a wash cloth4) The carpet is worn and dirty. 5) The jacuzzi is actually boarded up. 6) I am concerned about the structural integrity of the bed 7) The TV actually had knobs***PROS***1) I didn't hear any screaming or sirens2) I was not mugged3) They made it easy for me to check out that very day4)It is very inexpensive5) It is centrally located
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: Filthy Pit This hotel was the worst hotel I have ever have experienced...ever. They claim to have a shuttle that takes you downtown, but was conveniently not running on the weekends. I specifically wanted a place to stay that had a shuttle available to take us downtown. I was going to the Mariner game that night, and did not want to drive. What's the use of staying in a hotel that supposedly has a shuttle for your convenience and don't inform you of that it only runs during the week until you have already checked in!!! This place is a pit. There was dirt all along the baseboards and gross gunk under the table. The tiolet barely flushed and the shower was clogged. Not to mention that the room smelled horrible. I didn't even want to sleep on the so-called queen bed that was all dusty. Don't ever stay here, even if $ is the issue. You will definately get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: A Neighborhood Experience A great place for the family, close to all the action of downtown without the price. A fully furnished apartment setting.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: Terrible and bad neighborhood This place is terrible. Website looked ok, but it is a dangerous dump. We left after one night. Most guests were transient housing folks. Barb wire around parking lot, no Air Conditioning, just a dumpy apt building.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
